Comments_List: It is amazing how quickly everyone picks up on this language. I feel confident speaking it and writing and listening to the language which is something I've never felt before in a language class.
I gained a better understanding of the Indonesian language and a more confidence in conversing with the language.
By taking this course you dont only get to learn the Indonesian language you learn a lot about Indonesian culture which is very interesting!
An understanding of the Indonesian language and culture.
Strengths are the instructor. She makes everyone want to be there and excited about learning. Very fun but also challenging. Very appropriate amount of homework and assignments.
This is an amazing course that I love. Class is fun and informative. The professor and the other students are great and learning is enjoyable.
The best class to take at Yale.
The course is very fun and interesting and a nice way to start each day! You get to try different Indonesian foods and learn Indonesian songs.

yes! take this class as your language requirement. The instructor is incredible, and you learn so much about the culture. IF you put in the work and participate in class you will be able to speak Indonesian very well which is amazing. Dinny is my favorite instructor that I have ever had. Perfect start to my day every morning.
Yes! Take Indonesian. It is the best.
Absolutely! Best course offered by Yale.

Definitely. This course is very fun which is important as you have to go every morning! Indonesian is a great language to learn and the class is very interesting as you learn a lot about Indonesia as a country and not just the language.
